<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===-- Debug.cpp - An easy way to add debug output to your code ----------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This file implements a handy way of adding debugging information to your</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// code, without it being enabled all of the time, and without having to add</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// command line options to enable it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In particular, just wrap your code with the LLVM&#95;DEBUG() macro, and it will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be enabled automatically if you specify &#39;-debug&#39; on the command-line.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Alternatively, you can also use the SET&#95;DEBUG&#95;TYPE(&quot;foo&quot;) macro to specify</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that your debug code belongs to class &quot;foo&quot;.  Then, on the command line, you</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can specify &#39;-debug-only=foo&#39; to enable JUST the debug information for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// foo class.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When compiling without assertions, the -debug-&#42; options and all code in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LLVM&#95;DEBUG() statements disappears, so it does not affect the runtime of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Signal handlers - dump debug output on termination.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152" lineLink="#a4113346ad7a761b7f9df8ae45f8c580c"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a4113346ad7a761b7f9df8ae45f8c580c">debug&#95;user&#95;sig&#95;handler</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Cookie) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is a bit sneaky.  Since this is under #ifndef NDEBUG, we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// know that debug mode is enabled and dbgs() really is a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// circular&#95;raw&#95;ostream.  If NDEBUG is defined, then dbgs() ==</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// errs() but this will never be invoked.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/circular-raw-ostream">llvm::circular&#95;raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;dbgout =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/circular-raw-ostream">circular&#95;raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">llvm::dbgs</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  dbgout.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/circular-raw-ostream/#a1d35e899d253649e0248ab661f741fa7">flushBufferWithBanner</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// dbgs - Return a circular-buffered debug stream.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">llvm::dbgs</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do one-time initialization in a thread-safe way.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">dbgstream &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/circular-raw-ostream">circular&#95;raw&#95;ostream</a> strm;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    dbgstream()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">        : strm(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9a7b5c68c90f85baaedaa854cc5002cc">errs</a>(), </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&#42;&#42;&#42; Debug Log Output &#42;&#42;&#42;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">               (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a14b31b0aa8f77d16dfcae8e25021383d">EnableDebugBuffering</a> || !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a58509b852790f6ca23065ec638bc30ff">DebugFlag</a>) ? 0 : &#42;<a href="#a52478ba5f6209eb1f2d69eaf21d4f62f">DebugBufferSize</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a14b31b0aa8f77d16dfcae8e25021383d">EnableDebugBuffering</a> &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a58509b852790f6ca23065ec638bc30ff">DebugFlag</a> &amp;&amp; &#42;<a href="#a52478ba5f6209eb1f2d69eaf21d4f62f">DebugBufferSize</a> != 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Add a handler for SIGUSER1-type signals so the user can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// force a debug dump.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a9b92e7ec359dded2b96fb6491fb99d8b">sys::AddSignalHandler</a>(&amp;<a href="#a4113346ad7a761b7f9df8ae45f8c580c">debug&#95;user&#95;sig&#95;handler</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise we&#39;ve already set the debug stream buffer size to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// zero, disabling buffering so it will output directly to errs().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; thestrm;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> thestrm.strm;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Avoid &quot;has no symbols&quot; warning.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// dbgs - Return errs().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9a7b5c68c90f85baaedaa854cc5002cc">errs</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a35526021c09988c9ef8e25cc9e6bb74c">llvm::initDebugOptions</a>() &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// EnableDebugBuffering - Turn on signal handler installation.</span></CodeLine>
